name: Gajanan Vigneswaran
Summary: Highly motivated second-year Computer Science student at Toronto Metropolitan University with a strong foundation in software development, AI, and machine learning. Experienced in research and industry projects, with expertise in Python, JavaScript, and full-stack web development. Passionate about problem-solving, teamwork, and leveraging technology to drive innovative solutions.

Work Experience.title: Research Assistant
description: Developed a deep learning model to improve multimodal medical image registration, a process that aligns medical images from different sources (e.g., MRI and CT scans) to reduce costs while improving diagnosis and treatment.
Awarded the Undergraduate Research Opportunities Award from the TMU Faculty of Science.
Conducted a literature review on deep learning techniques for image registration, analyzing 25+ research papers.
Designed and implemented a Siamese Network to learn an image similarity metric for more precise alignment.
Utilized a ResNet model pre-trained on medical images with transfer learning for feature extraction.
Presented project proposals to my professor and led knowledge transfer sessions for incoming master’s students.
Technologies: Python, TensorFlow, NumPy, matplotlib, Jupyter Notebook.

Work Experience.title: Process Operator
description: Ensured control and safety processes were met while reaching monthly production targets.
Improved assembly line process to increase line efficiency by 15%.
Maintained production flow and met operational targets by efficiently managing process controls.
Participated in safety audits and emergency response protocols to uphold workplace safety standards.

Work Experience.title: Food Packer and Prepper
description: Packed and prepared food for delivery services, and assisted wait staff with food delivery and order-taking during peak.
Operated efficiently in a high-pressure, fast-paced environment, balancing multiple tasks while upholding service quality standards.
Communicated effectively with kitchen and service staff to ensure accurate and timely order fulfillment.
Delivered exceptional customer service by proactively addressing special requests and ensuring order accuracy.

Education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (BS)
Relevant Coursework: Introduction to Computer Science in Python
Introduction to C, C++ and UNIX
Probability and Statistics I with R

Education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering (BEng) - Incomplete

Projects.title: Movie Rating and Recommendations Website
Projects.description: This Flask web app provides a personalized movie ranking and recommendation experience for users. With user authentication and an integrated movie data API, the platform allows users to rate movies and receive tailored recommendations powered by a content-based machine-learning model. The app features a structured SQL database managed with SQLAlchemy, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval.

Projects.title: Notes App with the PERN stack
Projects.description: Built a full-stack notes application using the PERN stack. Implemented secure user authentication, structured a relational database, and ensured seamless communication between the React frontend and Express.js backend.

Projects.title: RESTful Blog API & Client with Authentication
Projects.description: Developed a RESTful API with user authentication, enabling users to create, read, update, and delete blog posts via API calls. Integrated OAuth authentication and bcrypt-based password security.

Projects.title: Digit Recognition App
Projects.description: Trained a convolutional neural network on a dataset of 60,000 hand-written digits. Implemented a user-friendly GUI using Tkinter, allowing users to draw digits for recognition.

Projects.title: Bookstore Project
Projects.description: We collaboratively built a user-friendly GUI for an online bookstore, featuring user profiles and efficient order management. Designed UML class and use case diagrams to outline system structure and user interactions.

Projects.title: ASL Flashcard App
Projects.description: Developed a Flashcard application for learning American Sign Language (ASL) with dynamic word repetition based on user performance. Integrated Selenium for word lookups in ASL, enhancing learning with quick access to relevant resources.

Projects.title: Image Watermarking Desktop App
Projects.description: Developed a user-friendly graphical interface for adding and saving custom watermarks to images. Designed the app using object-oriented design principles to make the code modular, scalable, and easier to read.

Projects.title: Family Travel Map Tracker
Projects.description: Developed an interactive web application for tracking visited countries, allowing users to add family members and countries they've traveled to, resulting in a personalized and visual record of their travel history. Designed a dynamic UI with EJS templates, enabling country colors to update based on user for an engaging experience.
